sense.def:
Pressure
je sila, ki nastane, ko nekaj močno pritisnemo.

seg.quote: He disliked the pressure of her hand.
It bent when pressure was put upon it.

sense.def:
Pressure
je tudi sila, s katero določena količina plina ali tekočine pritiska na površino, ki se je dotika.

seg.quote: I'll just check the tyre pressure.

sense.def:
To put pressure on someone
pomeni poskušati nekoga prepričati, naj nekaj stori.

seg.quote: For a long time he's been trying to put pressure on us to go.
They were under pressure from feminists.

sense.def:
To pressure someone to do something
pomeni poskušati nekoga na silo prepričati, naj nekaj stori.

seg.quote: The children are not pressured to eat.
Some young people are pressured into staying on at school.

sense.def:
To feel pressure
pomeni imeti občutek, da imamo preveč dela in premalo časa, da bi ga opravili.

seg.quote: We do our best work under pressure.
